content.question: Which of the following statements best describes the relationship between the beginning and the end of the chord progression heard?

choices.label: It begins in the major mode and ends in the relative minor.
It begins in the minor mode and ends in the relative major.
It begins and ends in the major mode.
It begins and ends in the minor mode.

content.answer: It begins in the minor mode and ends in the relative major.
